appDescription: Upload your Lichess PGN. Get a personalized training plan powered by Gemini.
analysisFailedDetails: An error occurred during analysis. Please ensure your API key is configured correctly and the PGN is valid. Details: {{error}}
foundGames: Found {{count}} lost games for '{{user}}' to analyze from a total of {{total}} games.
readyDescription: Provide your Lichess username and upload a PGN file containing your games. Our AI will analyze your losses to find patterns and create your path to improvement.
clipboardPoweredBy: Analysis powered by: ChessTrax AI Coach using Google Gemini 2.5 Flash. No engines were used.
error.fileRead: Failed to read the PGN file.
error.noUserOrPgn: Please provide a Lichess username and a PGN file with games you have lost.
error.analysis: An error occurred during analysis. Please ensure your API key is configured correctly and the PGN is valid. Details: {{error}}
